name: Alone You Came
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and Mac

Alone You Came is a 2 player experience about a sun and a moon which find each other in the dark.

The game can be played with 1 player as well (using 2 hands)

CONTROLS

Sun: W,A,S,D

Moon: Arrow keys up, left, down, right

Quit the game

Mac: CMD + Q

Windows: ALT + F4

THE TEAM

GIANLUCA VATINNO

JESSIE VAN AELST

RONG LIN

Made for the ustwo games Game Jam 2021

Music

SCP-x6x (Hopes) by Kevin MacLeodLink: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/6736-scp-x6x-hopes-License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Link: https://www.dafont.com/moonrise.font

Script

Link: https://github.com/TonyViT/CurvedTextMeshPro/blob/master/README.md
